# relativeFanSpeedSetting

**Instance Property**

A relative fan speed setting.

## Declaration

```swift
var relativeFanSpeedSetting: INRelativeSetting { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to adjust the fan speed to the next or previous setting. The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRelativeSetting/unknown] when the user modified a different climate control setting.

## Getting the Fan Settings

- **enableFan**: A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the cabin fan system.
- **fanSpeedIndex**: An integer value indicating the desired fan speed position.
- **fanSpeedPercentage**: A floating-point value indicating the requested fan speed specified as a percentage of the maximum speed.
